channel.title: Lifestyle on Portfolio website of Renata Mariani
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Portfolio website of Renata Mariani

item.title: Advanced Pandas
item.description: library(reticulate) library("readxl") First we will load the Energy Indicators data frame of the energy supply and renewable electricity production from the United Nations for the year 2013.

item.title: 2016 California Contributors plots
item.description: In this challenge we will reproduce the plots of the 2016 California Contributors, shown below. Firstly, we will import the CA contributors dataset and the zip code data base and merge both. # Load dataframes CA_contributors_2016 <- vroom::vroom(here::here("data","CA_contributors_2016.csv")) glimpse(CA_contributors_2016) ## Rows: 1,292,843 ## Columns: 4 ## $ cand_nm <chr> "Clinton, Hillary Rodham", "Clinton, Hillary Rodham… ## $ contb_receipt_amt <dbl> 50.0, 200.0, 5.0, 48.3, 40.0, 244.3, 35.0, 100.0, 2… ## $ zip <dbl> 94939, 93428, 92337, 95334, 93011, 95826, 90278, 90… ## $ contb_date <date> 2016-04-26, 2016-04-20, 2016-04-02, 2016-11-21, 20… zip_code <- vroom::vroom(here::here("data","zip_code_database.
